article.name: Colour Gradient (Red Yellow)
article.description:
As the title says, this was infact a random number generator, I think a lottery number generator. However, I retuned it for generating a set of colour gradients. I\'m not sure how I did it exactly, but the exact weighting of the colour gradient varies by increasing a colour channel by a max/min value until it reaches the other end.
The other part is using CSS and numerical colour selection, rather then trying to use Hex websafe codes. It creates a nice effect.
article.keywords: colour, gradient, red, yellow, php, script, random, number, generator, shading, weights.
